game.name: Princesses Bffs Wedding
game.description:
Three cute and lovely princesses Ariel, Cinderella and Elsa have made a plan to hold a mass wedding. Although it sounds fabulous, it is not going to be easy at all especially when all the three princesses want to look awesome on their special day. For this reason, they have hired you as their personal fashion designer who knows how to create the wonderful wedding outfits. Would you give your helping hands to these lovely girls? Join Princesses Bffs Wedding and be prepared to design the perfect wedding outfits!
Remember they all are BFFs, so these girls want to enjoy their wedding together. It will be your responsibility now to find out the perfect wedding dresses in this brand new dressing game for girls. Various types of outfits like voluminous, lacy and mermaid style to choose from. It is up to you whether you opt for a non-white wedding outfit, classic or a timeless option. Make sure to choose the nice heels, makeup, veils, dresses, shoes, and elegant earrings and necklaces in this one of the best html5 princess games for kids. 
Give her a trendy haircut and also provide her with a lovely gorgeous veil on her head! Apart from completing all the details for the wedding, you also have to take care of the selection of a perfect ballroom. Do everything you can do to make all the princesses look perfect on their big day! Dress each princess one by one and keep mixing and matching until you create the fabulous looks for the three! Enjoy more princess dress up mobile games online without download games!
